blocks.title: Overview
blocks.text: This was a pretty fun project, I made in Django. It was interesting to learn more about backend interactions between users. Ideally you can have one computer running it on a local network, and then all the users on that network are able to communicate with eachother through the app. In the future it might be a good idea to have it running on a server and then users can create chats between eachother, like WhatsApp or something like that, but for now this works great.
